synopsis.text:
City's You Show Duel School, Yuya Sakaki aspires to become a renowned "duel-tainer," blending entertainment and dueling in the spirit of his missing father. Thanks to advancements in Solid Vision technology by the Leo Corporation, Action Duels have revolutionized the world of Duel Monsters, giving physical form to monsters and immersive environments for duelists to interact with.

During a high-stakes duel against the reigning Action Duel champion, Yuya unlocks the power of Pendulum Summoning through a mysterious pendant. This extraordinary ability enables him to summon multiple monsters simultaneously, propelling him into the international spotlight overnight.

As the CEO of the Leo Corporation, Reiji Akaba, begins to incorporate Pendulum Summoning into the system, Yuya embarks on a journey to unravel the mysteries surrounding this enigmatic new power and the disappearance of his father. Along the way, he faces a myriad of rivals and challenges that push him to redefine his understanding of dueling and what it truly means to be an Entertainment Duelist. With courage and determination, Yuya steps forward to embrace the infinite possibilities that await him in the world of Action Duels.
